Wherever you live in this world, Donald Trump has affected your life in a way, mostly bad.

Okay Let’s start with the bad stuff:

  • The power of social and mainstream media. His election inarguably was won through his marketing skills (He’s great at it to be honest), maintream media kept highlighting all of the stupid things that he say all day - non-stop. That is crazy to think that he got around 2 billion dollars worth of free publicity through his rethorics. Social media magnified the problem through its ability to consume the people’s attention 24/7. This a big hole in the way majority of us view the world as we forgot how to think and analyze what is truly beneficial to talk about.. Another example why I keep saying most people are like zombies nowadays. I got in to a heated argument with a girl in Thailand before by just explaining how I have perceived of him winning the election against another bad apple - Hilary Clinton.
  • Lying becomes the new normal. He is insane, not insidious - yet. He keeps talking about putting a wall to guard Mexico from bringing drugs and guns to his country. He speaks of it like it is a crisis that his country needs to pay attention but he still keeps golfing on the weekend for 6 hours.. He’s delusion about what he want’s to promote as a right he acquired from winning the old office is so amazing and stupid at the same time that the strongest economy in the world is being ran by a guy that is full of shit. I had a friend whom I met in Palawan from the US wherein she had gone traveling since Trump won and she basically doesn’t want to comeback until things change.
  • Climate Change Denial.
